about_the_game:
THE MOST FUN VR HAND RACING

You're a racer from the future. Speed ​​is your passion and purpose in life. Super fast racing ships and futuristic tracks make this game an unforgettable experience. Improve your skills, unlock new ships and take top spot on the leaderboard.

COMFORTABLE VR EXPERIENCE
We go the extra mile to ensure that Z-Race is the most comfortable VR racing game ever. Collect nitro boosts and coins, avoid energy traps and obstacles, overtake competitors with minimal motion sickness. A game for all ages, both kids and adults can play it!

ASYNCHRONOUS MULTIPLAYER

Go head to head with anyone thanks to our asynchronous multiplayer. You will never be alone with the ghosts of your friends and strangers. In virtual reality, this is the best opportunity to always compete with worthy opponents.

FULLY IMMERSIVE AUDIO

What's a VR racing experience without some intense heart rate music? We've carefully selected the in-game music to ensure that you will feel the rythm of the game pumping through your veins. We've also included unique trainers with the voices of your favourite VR creators!

MARVELOUS TRACKS

New ships and track become available during playthrough. The better you do, the more you will unlock. Upgrade your ships speed, agility, and nitro capacity via in-game currency.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DIrectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Z-Race is a fun arcade hand-racing VR game. Control futuristic ships designed in the style of your favourite VR creators with their voice acting. Fly at super-fast speeds on chic sci-fi tracks, collecting nitro boosts and coins, avoiding energy traps and obstacles to become the first!
